hero.title:
Building a Scalable
Decentralized Social Media
Network on Bitcoin

intro.title: What is MetaSo?
intro.description: MetaSo is a decentralized social network software package based on MetaID protocol. Developers and users can participate in building a global Bitcoin-based decentralized social network by installing and deploying MetaSo nodes.

decentralized.title: Total Decentralized
decentralized.description: MetaSo data is entirely sourced from on-chain data of Bitcoin and its sidechains, with each node locally storing and indexing the relevant data. MetaSo nodes are interconnected via P2P, without relying on any third parties, making it the first truly decentralized social media network based on Bitcoin.

crosschain.title: Cross-Chain
crosschain.description: MetaSo is based on the MetaID protocol and fully supports the philosophy of MetaBitcoin Network, meaning it can support Bitcoin and its many sidechains. Users can choose to use Bitcoin assets within the MetaSo social media platform and select suitable sidechains for data on-chain. This approach addresses the issues of high transaction fees and network congestion on Bitcoin.

customization.title: Allowing Deep Customization
customization.description: Each MetaSo node can modify its style through backend configuration, enabling every MetaSo node to have a unique UI interface. Each node can also customize its own pricing standards, blacklists, filtering mechanisms, and more. Additionally, experienced developers are allowed to perform deeper customizations and develop more features for social applications based on the MetaSo node.

steps.title: Be a Part of the Decentralized Social Network for the World
steps.step2: Config for Your Own Social Media App

q1.question: What Types Of App Can Metaso Nodes Be Used For?
q1.answer: In addition to web3 social applications, MetaSo can also create many types of applications such as notes, netbooks, games and music.

q2.question: What types of applications can MetaSo nodes be used for?
q2.answer: MetaSo nodes come with a built-in on-chain social application frontend similar to X.com. However, MetaSo nodes also include a rich set of built-in APIs, enabling developers to create a wide variety of applications, such as Instagram-like apps, Facebook-like apps, on-chain note-taking apps, on-chain music apps, and more. These applications can interoperate with data across all MetaSo nodes, collectively forming a large Web3 application network.

q3.question: What is the distribution cycle and method for $METASO?
q3.answer: $METASO operates on a statistical cycle of 144 Bitcoin blocks, approximately 24 hours, with one calculation per cycle. In each cycle, the newly added MDV value of each node is considered its "contribution value," and daily $METASO is distributed based on each node's contribution value. In the early stages of $METASO's launch, to ensure accurate distribution, a T+1 distribution method will be adopted. This means that after each statistical cycle ends, the corresponding $METASO distribution will be delayed by one day. $METASO will be distributed on the Bitcoin network in MRC20 format, and users are responsible for covering the associated miner fees for receiving $METASO.

q4.question: What is the positioning of $METASO? How can ordinary users participate?
q4.answer: $METASO is positioned to incentivize MetaSo node operators. The MetaSo project aims to build a decentralized, global social media network, where the number and quality of nodes are key metrics. Thus, $METASO distribution is targeted at node operators. Currently, there is no direct participation method for ordinary users. As the MetaSo project team, we do not encourage or participate in any secondary circulation of $METASO. However, we will focus on developing more node tools to help MetaSo node operators more easily create and implement their own node-specific incentive mechanisms to attract users. In the future, possibilities may include: MetaSo node backends allowing configuration to redistribute $METASO to users based on contribution value; One-click MRC20 minting and airdrop tools for node operators; Or various incentive mechanisms independently designed by node operators. The design philosophy of $METASO is to incentivize node operators to attract more high-quality users who generate greater interaction value. The competition between nodes is essentially a competition for the number of these high-quality users. Therefore, we believe that in this competitive process, different nodes will gradually introduce diverse incentive measures to attract users to their nodes.

hero.title: What is MetaSo?
hero.description: MetaSo is an open-source, social networking, Web3 middleware based on MetaID protocol. Developers can deploy new Web3 social applications in 20 minutes by simply editing the configuration files. MetaSo was launched and operated by DAO and incentivized with tokenomics. Data in Different MetaSo applications are interconnected and interoperable. MetaSo will bust data silos and build an ultimate decentralized Web3 social platform.

why.title: Why do you need Metaso?
why.subtitle: Metaso is a platform designed to provide safer, more convenient and more open social nodes

account.title: One account / mnemonic phrase to use all social apps
account.description: Metaso achieves account portability through the MetaID protocol. Users can use an account or mnemonic phrase to log in to all social applications that support Metaso.

interconnection.title: Data interconnection between all social platforms
interconnection.description: This means that users' data on different social platforms can be circulated and shared with each other, improving the availability and connectivity of data.

security.title: Users don't have to worry about being deleted or tampered with by social platforms
security.description: Metaso ensures the decentralization and non-tampering of data by uploading all data to the chain, and the security of user data is protected.

freedom.title: Users don't have to worry about their accounts being banned by social platforms
freedom.description: Metaso provides independence between accounts and social platform accounts.

bitcoin.title: Completely based on Bitcoin
bitcoin.description: Completely based on Bitcoin and Bitcoin-related ecology, data security cannot be tampered with and belongs to the user himself

metaid.title: Built based on MetaID protocol
metaid.description: Built based on the MetaID protocol, one wallet uses all MetaSo social applications, and data interconnection between different applications

integrated.title: Highly integrated software
integrated.description: The MetaSo software package is highly integrated and ordinary users can install it and become a node in the network within 30 minutes.

incentives.title: Receive $MetaSo incentives
incentives.description: By operating MetaSo, you can receive $MetaSo incentives and contribute to the global decentralized network.

storage.title: Decentralized Data Storage
storage.description: Decentralized storage of data is one of the most important features of MetaSo. Thanks to the mechanisms of Bitcoin and Metaso, we can obtain a social network that belongs to humans around the world, where data is completely distributed and stored. This network is not controlled by any party, and the data belongs to the user himself.

hero.title: Installation Guide
hero.description: To make MetaSo accessible to everyone, all programs are packaged into a single installation package, including one-click upgrade Installing, ensuring all MetaSo nodes across the network can stay in sync.
